MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML9 postcode area of Larkhall, affecting properties in Middleton Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.52am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.28pm on 4th January 2021.
